captions.text:
Everybody plays
"Improbable School".

Andy is the teacher and his job is
to guess who are his students.

He'll put on a headphone so he
doesn't hear what we're doing.

Our producers gave us this
envelope with the characters...
Nobody knows what's written in here.

Daniel will be an 'espresso
machine with a cold'.

Edu is a 'king's messenger who
sings for a samba school'.
And we'll create Elidio's character.
Any ideas?

- Waiter. - Waiter?
Something bizarre about him...

A waiter with Parkinson's. But he has
Parkinson's when something happens.

- Whenever a bell rings!
- Whenever a bell rings!

A waiter that shakes whenever a bell rings.
Anderson won't guess Parkinson's.

All right. A 'waiter who
shakes whenever a bell rings'.
"Improbable School" starts now.

Let me start by making the
roll call and some questions.

- Number one.
- Ask me and I'll take a guess!
I need to catch the next express!
Sorry, I'm leaking!

Can you get me
a paper filter, please?

- So, there was a nuclear accident in
Japan... - Everything was grinded, right?

No, there are still some
reactors in the city,

I'd like to know in which
japanese city are those reactors?

- Java.
- No, no.

- Turkey.
- You don't know, you'll get an F.

C'mon teacher,
can you give me a break?
No, all you get is an F.

- What is this?
- I left everything black, teacher!

Got it? There's
still some left inside!
Okay. Number two!
Bring it on, your majesty!
You may ask!
Now, in 2014, unfortunately...

It's the 20th anniversary of the
death of a brazilian sportsman.

While he performed. What is
the name of this sportsman?

Your majesty...
Allow me to answer!

Born in São Paulo
around the sixties

Against Alain Prost
he raced so swiftly

In a curve he passed away,
what a sad day, Ayrton Senna
Good. Very good!

- Your majesty...
- Do you know what do you get? An A!

- Number three!
- The teacher called, I'm on my way!

Just don't touch me,
I might drop the tray.

- You can ask me, teacher.
- Dear Lord...

Sorry, teacher,
table seven is calling me.
The UFC is on TV right now...

What was the
question again, teacher?

Which japanese city suffered
a nuclear accident recently?

Must have been Two Temakis!
Wasn't it?

The city of Misoshiru!
Misoshiru, table seven? No?
I got what you do for a living...

- The towel gives it away.
- Teacher, it must have been...

- Sit down, you got an F!
- I got an F?
No tip for me...

- No one ordered me? - Teacher,
do you know who your students are?
I'll take a guess.
Take a guess.
Daniel is an espresso machine...
That leaks.

- Give me a tissue... - Daniel is an
espresso machine with a cold!
It gets harder every day...

Edu is a samba school singer
who is a medieval messenger.
Wow, very good!

- Ten!
- Ten!

And Elidio... He's a waiter who has
Parkinson's when a bell rings!
Holy crap!

That didn't count, he doesn't
have Parkinson's, he shakes!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

'Improbable endings
for Spider-Man'

- Listen to me, man!
- Change!
You listen!

comments.text:
Se é combinado ( oque nao acredito que seja ) nao me importo.
Só sei que o objetivo deles que arrancar boas risadas eles fazem com louvor.
Admiro muito o trabalho e sempre acompanho cada postagem na net. 
Pena que nao tenho condiçoes de ir a Sao Paulo ver pessoalmente o 
espetaculo mais se pudesse ja tinha ido faz tempo. Todos meus amigos que 
mostro os videos passam a acompanha-los tambem.
Vocês sao os melhores. ;)﻿

comments.text:
pelo que li alguns comentários abaixo , algumas pessoas suspeitam se é 
combinado o jogo , a única coisa que fico com o pé atrás é o fato de sempre 
ser o Andy que é o professor... mas acho que não deve ser combinado pq se 
não revezariam mais vezes com os outros , eu acho que pelo menos quem se 
desenvolve melhor nesse jogo é o Andy, por isso na maioria das vezes é ele 
quem adivinha.
Não podemos mesmo duvidar da capacidade de cada um , ainda mais de caras 
feras como eles ♥ ... sem contar que fazem isso há anos....

e eu fiz como comentaram embaixo, tentei tbm adivinhar o personagem em 
outro video da escolinha e cheguei até que perto. ﻿
